name: MIS Historic Balance Report
description:
Produces prisoner account balances for a date, or range of dates, entered by the user at the user prompt.
FIN0015 - v00.00.12

dataset.name: All Account Balances
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Account Date (Start) e.g. (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Account Date (End) e.g. (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, 'TBD' AS V_SUM_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(SUM(SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53 || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38 || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36) - V_SUM_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT) AS V_DAILY_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

dataset.name: Prisoner Details
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y')) UNION SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, 'Unknown', 'Unknown' FROM BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK <> '999'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, 'TBD' AS V_SUM_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(SUM(SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53 || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38 || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36) - V_SUM_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT) AS V_DAILY_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Advance Payments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE + 1 AS BUSINESS_DATE_1, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE + 1 BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Account Date (Start) e.g. (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Account Date (End) e.g. (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE + 1), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BUSINESS_DATE_1, ADVANCE_AMOUNT, REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prior Advance Payments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'ADV' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS ADVANCE_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'DED' AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE + 1 < (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Account Date (Start) e.g. (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ADVANCE_AMOUNT, REPAYMENT_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

field.name: $ref:SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

field.name: $ref:V_SUM_OF_ADVANCE_AMOUNT
field.legacySql: =[v_Sum_Prior_Outstanding_Advs]+RunningSum([Advance Payments].[Advance Amount])-RunningSum([Advance Payments].[Repayment of Advance Amount])

field.name: $ref:V_DAILY_TOTAL
field.legacySql: =Sum(Sum([Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance]+[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance]+[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance])-[v_Sum of Advance amount])
